mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AT_CST_IMY( CP_CODE, CN_IDENTIFER, IMY_FORM, CID, IMY_STATUS, IMY_OPT, IMY_REASON, IMY_AUDIT_RST, IMY_RESULT, IMY_SUM, PAY_TYPE, PAY_TIME, OPERATOR, REMARK ) VALUES( #{cpCode}, #{cnIdentifer}, #{imyForm}, #{cid}, #{imyStatus}, #{imyOpt}, #{imyReason}, #{imyAuditRst}, #{imyResult}, #{imySum}, #{payType}, #{payTime}, #{operator}, #{remark} )
mapper.select: SELECT c.ID as id, CP_CODE as cpCode, CN_IDENTIFER as cnIdentifer, IMY_FORM as imyForm , CID as cid , IMY_STATUS as imyStatus, IMY_OPT as imyOpt, IMY_REASON as imyReason, IMY_AUDIT_RST as imyAuditRst, IMY_RESULT as imyResult, IMY_SUM as imySum , PAY_TYPE as payType, PAY_TIME as payTime, OPERATOR as operator , CREATE_TIME as createTime, UPDATE_TIME as updateTime , REMARK as remark FROM AT_CST_IMY c WHERE c.ID=#{id}

SELECT c.ID as id, CP_CODE as cpCode, CN_IDENTIFER as cnIdentifer, IMY_FORM as imyForm , CID as cid , IMY_STATUS as imyStatus, IMY_OPT as imyOpt, IMY_REASON as imyReason, IMY_AUDIT_RST as imyAuditRst, IMY_RESULT as imyResult, IMY_SUM as imySum , PAY_TYPE as payType, PAY_TIME as payTime, OPERATOR as operator , CREATE_TIME as createTime, UPDATE_TIME as updateTime , REMARK as remark FROM AT_CST_IMY c ORDER BY createTime
